#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(DLMS-COSEM-TEST)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)
include_directories(../../lib/DLMS-COSEM/include/ ../../lib/googletest-release-1.7.0/include/)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++11 -D_DEBUG -DASIO_STANDALONE -DASIO_HAS_STD_CHRONO -DUNITTEST")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -D_DEBUG -DASIO_STANDALONE -DASIO_HAS_STD_CHRONO -DUNITTEST")

link_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../lib/DLMS-COSEM/Debug/ ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../lib/googletest-release-1.7.0/Debug/)

add_executable(DLMS-COSEM-TEST DLMS-COSEM-TEST.cpp UnitTest-APDU-AARE.cpp UnitTest-APDU-AARQ.cpp UnitTest-COSEM-Client.cpp UnitTest-HDLC-Address.cpp UnitTest-HDLC-Client.cpp UnitTest-HDLC-LLC.cpp UnitTest-HDLC-MAC.cpp UnitTest-HDLC-Packet.cpp UnitTest-HDLC-Server.cpp UnitTest-IDLMSInterface.cpp UnitTest-LinuxMemory.cpp UnitTest-StateMachine.cpp)
target_link_libraries(DLMS-COSEM-TEST DLMS-COSEM gtest pthread)
